text: 2.10 2 Ko 1.6, Epe 3.13, Kol 1.24 God takaw ak nag ma lup, anɨb ak yad wog ne okok mɨdupsek kɨles tɨmel gɨl mɨŋel anɨb okok dɨpin. Pen binɨb God ne kɨlop dɨnɨg aglak okok, kɨlop abe gos nepin. Kɨli Klays Jisas nop chɨgel God kɨlop tɨg asɨk dek, pel pelnep kɨm mɨdɨl mɨdtep gɨnɨgabal gos ak nepin. Anɨb ak yad wog ne okok mɨdupsek kɨles tɨmel gɨl mɨŋel anɨb okok dɨpin.
